content.question: Which of the following developments within France during the nineteenth century is best understood as a reaction to the divisions shown on the map?

choices.label: The modernization of transportation networks through railroad construction
The expansion of French colonies in North and West Africa
The development of a system of compulsory education

content.answer: The development of a system of compulsory education

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
